title: Initial Consultation
description: Book a 15 minute initial consultation with our Naturopathic Doctors to determine if IV therapy is right for you.

title: Blood Work
description: Specific blood work needs to be completed at Life Labs in Dawson Creek to ensure your safety before IV therapy is initiated.

title: Schedule Treatment Protocol
description: Once your bloodwork has been reviewed and approved, we will work with you to schedule a treatment protocol.

title: Attend IV Therapy Sessions
description: Come to your appointment hydrated, fed and ready to relax. Drips typically take 30-45 minutes.
